scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter @rtc-database/shared build:watch" "pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver dev" "pnpm --filter rtc-database-nativeapp dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter '@rtc-database/shared' build && pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver build && pnpm --filter rtc-database-nativeapp build
scripts.update:prisma: pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver exec prisma migrate dev && pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver exec prisma generate && pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver exec prisma db seed
scripts.seed: concurrently --kill-others-on-success "pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver dev" "node -e 'setTimeout(() => {}, 3000)' && pnpm --filter rtc-database-webserver exec prisma db seed"
